name: AloneWithTheDead
description:
We present you of our game "Alone with the Dead", which will soon appear in the Play Market.
In order not to miss the release join the group (https://vk.com/super_duper_games) and find out the news first 🍾 🎮 🥇 🎬
Enjoy this atmosphere, Sunny Miami on Idina with the dead 💉 🌅 🌇 😎

We will be very grateful for feedback on the game :)
At the moment, we are preparing a large update pack :P

(c) Super Duper Games.
